snippet: Andy Enfield was introduced as the new coach at Southern California. Enfield, 43, coached Florida Gulf Coast to an upset of Georgetown in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
abstract: Southern California introduces Andy Enfield as its men's basketball coach.
lead_paragraph: Andy Enfield was introduced as the new coach at Southern California. Enfield, 43, coached Florida Gulf Coast to an upset of Georgetown in the N.C.A.A. tournament.

headline.seo: U.S.C. Introduces Andy Enfield as Basketball Coach
headline.main: U.S.C. Introduces Enfield as Basketball Coach
